steps.title: Do you want to answer live calls?
steps.content: Do you want to answer live calls? A 900-number company can forward calls to you so you can answer the phone personally or you can choose to have a recorded message waiting for your customers.

steps.title: You can choose to charge customers per minute or a flat-rate fee.
steps.content: You can choose to charge customers per minute or a flat-rate fee. The fee you charge shouldn't be so high that people won't want to use your services.

steps.title: There will usually be a set-up fee and monthly maintenance fee.
steps.content: There will usually be a set-up fee and monthly maintenance fee. Up-front fees are charged to you for setting up your service. These fees can be very expensive, depending upon the type of services you desire. Monthly maintenance fees will also need to be paid for you to use the 900 phone service.

steps.title: Many companies will not start paying you until 50 days after you sign up.
steps.content: Many companies will not start paying you until 50 days after you sign up. Be sure you know exactly when you will be paid and how.

steps.title: Preambles are the recorded messages that a caller hears before they are transferred to your service.
steps.content: Preambles are the recorded messages that a caller hears before they are transferred to your service. The preamble usually contains specific things, such as the cost of the call, a description of the service provided, and age requirements. A caller is allowed to hang up during the preamble without any charge. However, you as a business owner may be charged by your 900-number provider. Some 900-number companies must approve your preamble before you can get a 900 number.

steps.title: It should take you 5 to 7 days to get a 900 number, depending on the services you choose.
steps.content: It should take you 5 to 7 days to get a 900 number, depending on the services you choose. Once you have a 900 number, start advertising your business and start making money.
